title: dynamic preference is a little ridiculous...
body:
out of the last 83 games i've played, 9 of them have been dynamic queue. Yet for some reason, I have "dynamic preference".  they are also very spread out, i didn't play 9 in a row. 

9/83 games means i prefer dynamic queue? Can someone at Riot please respond, is this a bug?

replies.body:
We actually just recently posted the formula used to calculate your Ranked Emblem. The *vast majority* of your last **25 wins** must be solo if you're trying to rep that solo emblem. You can find the formula listed in our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems)

Let me know if you have any questions.

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=8GKfE3Iv,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-09-19T22:00:16.101+0000)
>
> We actually just recently posted the formula used to calculate your Ranked Emblem. The *vast majority* of your last **25 wins** must be solo if you're trying to rep that solo emblem. You can find the formula listed in our [FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems)
> 
> Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you for the reply, I just calculated it and 4/25 of my last wins were dynamic. 3 of them were duo, and one was with 4...i'm at 1.24 instead of above 1.2 apparently.... oh well thank you for the formula.

I should really count all games, not just wins.

It should reflect how you queue up all the time, not just when you win.

The [emblem ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems)looks at your last 25 wins in dynamic queue and to get the solo emblem you have to play the vast majority of your games as a solo player.
